repo_learning.py

This module contains code for training and evaluating a model recognizing relations between function names and their tests.

The module includes functions for reading the dataset, configuring the dataset for training, creating a model, defining the loss function and optimizer, training the model, and evaluating the model on test instances.

It can be used as an example of how to train a model using the model API.

test_codes.repo_learning.evaluate_instances(dataset: CategoricDataset, model: CategoricNeuralNetwork, api: ModelApi)[source]

Evaluates the model on the instances of the dataset.

Parameters:

  • dataset (CategoricDataset) – The dataset to evaluate the model on.

  • model (CategoricNeuralNetwork) – The model to evaluate.

  • api (model_api.ModelApi) – The model API instance.

Returns:

A dictionary with the results of the evaluation.

Return type:

results_percentual_dict (dict)

test_codes.repo_learning.get_data(dataset_name)[source]

Reads the sentiment dataset and returns it as a pandas DataFrame.

Returns:

The sentiment dataset as a pandas DataFrame.

Return type:

df (pd.DataFrame)
